website_summaries.verdict: Somewhat basic, but Talking Tom is still an adorable toy that many youngsters - especially toddlers - will appreciate.
pros: Repeats any sound in a high pitched voice and is sure to elicit giggles from smaller children
Responds to touch for a more interactive experience
A winner if your little one loves Talking Tom
cons: Limited features and capabilities compared to some others on our list
Some Talking Toms were "duds" and didn't work as expected

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like the picture and only works if you press the ...
customer_reviews.text: 0ver $30 for a toy that is not much more then a little beanie baby. No sounds from the app. Doesn't look like the picture and only works if you press the hand. Doesn't work touching hands and tummy. 30 seconds and turns off, it takes that to respond so it's not ongoing if that's what you want. I am extremely disappointed. Grandsons birthday is a couple days away and really thought this was going to be a decent present. I read great reviews not sure if they actually have the one I received but this is far from being a 4 star let alone a 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Non-working Item. Save your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave the stars blank, I would. This toy stopped working 2 days after Christmas. I have an upset nephew who absolutely loves talking tom and was heartbroken when it stopped working. Changed batteries and still nothing. Seller will not exchange the toy. As I scroll through the comments, I see that we're not the only ones this has happened to. P.S. no, I cannot process a refund because my nephew will have a fit if I were to take this away from him.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased for one of my grandchildren was as described. The second order was obviously a knock off. It was smaller and didn't come in a factory box. It was missing some of the sensors and didn't do everything that was described. Very disappointed with the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken and used! Surprise did not happen!
customer_reviews.text: The idea was to buy a little gift for my little son - I have not seen him for a bit and wanted to make a surprise. The toy came up broken, used (instead of brand new), with two batteries (instead of three, not sure what happened with the third battery and why? - but somebody was definitely messing with it). Changed the batteries - did not work. So surprise did not happen. Bought exact same type of a toy in Toys R Us - new, clean, works, cheaper! Would recommend to avoid this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Georgy

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect. But
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. But, in my opinion, too expensive for the toy like this. I took off one star only because of the unreasonably high price. The quality is perfect though.
customer_reviews.author: Anatoly Belyaev

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and not in original packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived stuffed in a box. Looks nothing like the box or packaging pictured. The car was dirty, nonetheless, it’s too late to return and get a new one. My son will still love it. I’ll just have to clean him first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not Durable for a Small Child
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my 4 year old nephew. He LOVES it but it only worked for one month before the voice started messing up. now it doesn't record and play back at all. This is very disappointing for the cost. It doesn't appear to be very durable. I would not purchase again because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids..
customer_reviews.text: It's a Christmas for my adult daughter who has the Talking Tom app on her phone. I've been showing it to friends. "Tom" could even hear my mom's voice over the phone and was repeating what she said.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this talking Tom toy. Works well and provides hours of entertainment. Very soft and seems to be pretty durable as they’ve thrown it all over the house. Accidentally stepped on too, still works! :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Loud and annoying. No volume control. Doll is super tiny but my 3 year old enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my grandson for Christmas. It came just in a box not as seen on the website. It looks like I got it from a dollar store. I just hope it works becuz that’s all he wanted me to get. It is very small.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Mema

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: toy come with battery in it which means was already used. i replace anyway the batteries because was finished . suppose to be able to touch the tummy forehead and left food however nothing happen. the only option function is that the toy still repeat what we talk. luckily.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian A Ocando M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is funny!!!! just like the app. dog likes it too..just can't figure out why is repeating her bark!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne OBryant

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This product looked like a new item in a new Box and I received some crumpled up stuffed animal without a Box shoved in a cardboard Box. Also super tiny definitely not worth $26.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Talking tom
customer_reviews.text: Any child that loves talking tom will love this game. His appearance in original and he does repeat what is said. A Quality plush material. Good work!!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Bell

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. Got this for my son's 2nd Bday ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Got this for my son's 2nd Bday b/c he loves the app. I think he thinks Tom is his BFF. Lol. The sounds are cute when you pet him & his mouth moves when he talks. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is b/c it shuts off within a minute or 2, even though my son is still talking to him. I would understand if there was no activity, but not if it's obviously still recording sound. Definitely not worth $40, but the things we do for
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Perez

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it and so far it's worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: If your little one likes the app they will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my niece, she loved it. It does everything like in the app. Too cute and cool when the mouth moves when talking. Looks better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Tom tom cat
customer_reviews.text: My Nephew loved it. Just thought it was gonna look bigger when I got to see it in person but overall he really liked it and that’s all that mattered:)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this gift so much he still asks where it is everyday. HOWEVER, it had an electrical short that resulted in melting the batteries inside. Thank goodness we discovered it during the day because my son always had this in bed with him, and had it shorted then it could have set his sheets on fire. Very, very scary. I wish very much this hasn't happened. My son really loved this. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Picture is misleading
customer_reviews.text: The item does not come in a box as pictured. The stuffed animal comes in a plain white box with nothing on it. When you open it the item inside has a small tag on it, but otherwise is packaged nothing like the picture. It’s also VERY small.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order anything from this vendor.....
customer_reviews.text: This was such a disappointment. We purchased for Son’s birthday and it never worked. This company that I purchased this didn’t stand behind the product.

customer_reviews.title: after i gave it. and after 2 months of ...
customer_reviews.text: after i gave it. and after 2 months of not using it, it suddenly stop working. i tried to change the battery but still not working what to do with this one
customer_reviews.author: Jakeson fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Talking Tom is great for everyone
customer_reviews.text: One of the greatest toys I've seen in a long time. It's fun for all ages... Even this grandma! It's well made. He looks just like the talking Tom app.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Works great, it's a gift for my grand babies
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it's a gift for my grand babies, batteries may be run down before Christmas. My husband and I are having fun with it.

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable if u are smart you will not deal with this company

Looks like a TY toy maybe 6 inches tall. I'm not paying their shipping either. And I am sure when talking ginger comes she will be the same and will be returned

customer_reviews.title: Was better than we thought it was going to be
customer_reviews.text: Was better than we thought it was going to be. My wife and I had a lot of fun with it before we wrapped it didn't want to give. May even get one for us. Love his laugh when he laughs back.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun last year after I bought this little guy.

customer_reviews.title: like the recording time on the Talking Tom and Friends ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Works we'll. my son with autism loves his Talking Tom. Only negative is that I wished the length of the recording time was longer, like the recording time on the Talking Tom and Friends app. This toy only records and plays back a very few words. Still cute, but not quite as good as I was expecting at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Super happy I stumble upon this on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Super happy I stumble upon this on Amazon. If your kids love taking tom app, this is a must. I got one for all my nephews and nieces. Makes the same noise as the app when you hit his head and stomach. It's a little slow on the mic recording though but that doesn't bother the kids, they still love it cause the app comes to life!!! ☺️
customer_reviews.author: T4mm1

customer_reviews.title: my cat
customer_reviews.text: I love him! Just make sure no water or pain gets near him. WARNING:RESPECT TOM. NO THROWING,PUNCHING,OR KICKING HIM. NO WATER USAGE NEAR TOY OR HE WILL DIE!

customer_reviews.title: smaller than i expected.

customer_reviews.title: Love!! Came super fast can't wait for kids ...

customer_reviews.title: Great noisemaker!
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to be annoyed. Your children will love it for a while because it is a cute toy and it does make noise. Lots of noise. You squeeze the paw and say something, it will say it back in a pretty much unintelligible manner. Loudly.
customer_reviews.author: PaulExChandler

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected

customer_reviews.author: Ana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Of course the app is clearer... but ...
customer_reviews.text: Of course the app is clearer...but it is still a very cute toy for a child. My 80 years old mom loves it as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: The Birthday Girl Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone seems to love the Talking Tom game, so i bought this toy for a friends daughter on her birthday. I am not sure how well it works, but i do know that she really liked it and couldn't wait to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sphenman

customer_reviews.title: Talking Tom
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Talking Tom, repeats your voice just like the app. He does look a little bit better in the stock photos then he actually did but he's still cute. I got 4 for my kids for Christmas and I'm sure they are going to love them.
customer_reviews.author: patrick tan

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Repeat What You Say
customer_reviews.text: The toy does not repeat what we say. It makes all the other noises, but we cannot get it to repeat us. Every now and then it's mouth will move in an attempt to say something, but NOPE! My two year old is enjoying it as-is, so I'm not going to send it back, but buyer beware that mine is not the only one that does not repeat voices.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan's Mom

customer_reviews.title: talks back with my son and is all around a great cuddle buddy for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Tom was bought for my 2 year old son, since he loves playing The Talking Tom app on my phone I wanted to get him a Tom of his own. He hadn't put him down since he got here! What was going to be a Christmas gift, turned into an early gift. The moment he took a peek at who was in the box the smile on his face made it hard to say no. Tom is very cute, talks back with my son and is all around a great cuddle buddy for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The other sounds are ok; however, it does not repeat any words. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: We returned it due to inferior quality. The "same ...
customer_reviews.text: We returned it due to inferior quality. The "same item" at Toys-R-Us was much more attractive. The Amazon model was ugly and scary-looking. The Toys-R-Us model, same exact model number, etc. was much, much, much more appealing in quality and appearance (eyes, stitching, expression, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Maher Mull

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my daughter for Christmas. She has the talking tom app on her phone. Even that it works alittle different then the app it's still worth the price. But keep in mind to create something that works like software its a under a different platform. I give this a five stars for the over all of the product. It does everything by sound as the app shows on the phone. Good job guys for the work of making this to make it like the app.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dillinger

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: The delivery time was great. Anticipated turnaround was 2-3 weeks out and literally ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a compact chest for awhile. I'm actually using this piece as a vanity in a small nook and placing a floating glass shelf approximately 2-3" above so it's a bit larger in depth to add extra items on top. If you're looking for something sleek and contemporary... This is it! Chest arrived with just a couple of scratches but nothing I can't live with. The delivery time was great. Anticipated turnaround was 2-3 weeks out and literally received the item in 3 days instead! Overall super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Beamer

customer_reviews.title: He is funny and answers back without hesitation and if you call ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh yaaa!! This little fellow is a talkative one!.. He is funny and answers back without hesitation and if you call him names he answer back with the same insults to you!!! - A lot of fun for my grandson.. My grandson run behind me telling me: "Listen, listen Mamastella what this Tom Cat is calling me..." - I answer: Don't tease him if you don't want his answers..... A wonderful and good toy indeed, a lot of fun for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Marttin

customer_reviews.title: Bad talking Tom...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got did not work, I sent it back like I was suppose to I have never got a credit for it. I did order another one and it was ok it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: so it can't be that great,.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son... hell, it may very well be a five star item, but its sitting in his toy-chest untouched, so it can't be that great,... and he loved the cartoon on youtube, so I know he loves the Tom character... Meh. Why am I reviewing a toy for my son anyway? Well, too late to delete all this typing now... that would cost an extra two seconds... make that three... now four.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Olympia

product_meta.title: Dragon Toys Talking Tom - Repeats What You Say
product_meta.description:
Based on the popular app, Plush Talking Tom provides an exciting interactive experience for your child. He repeats everything you say when his talk-back function is activated. Makes a great friend for your little one to talk with at playtime. Requires 3 "AAA" batteries. 10"H. Plastic and polyester. For ages 3 and up.

Social media sensation!
Repeats what you say in a funny voice
"I say what you say!"
Details:
10"H
Plastic and polyester
For ages 3 and up
Battery operated
feature_bullets: When the lights comes on, start talking
